Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class TurnManager

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.TurnManager
public class TurnManager
extends java.lang.Object
TurnManager is a class that manage turn of every Player and update the Board and the Players according to input from view It is used by GameManager to call blocks of methods of the model

  • Method Details

    • startTurn

      public void startTurn()
      Start turn in gameInstance and set currentPlayerWorkersPosition

    • canCurrentPlayerMoveAWorker

      public boolean canCurrentPlayerMoveAWorker()
      Returns:
      true if the current Player can move at least one worker

    • movementPositions

      public java.util.List<Position> movementPositions​(Position workerPos) throws java.lang.NullPointerException, NotPresentWorkerException
      Return a list which contains Position where the worker can move
      Parameters:
      workerPos - Position where is located the worker that player want to move
      Returns:
      List of Position that contains Position where the worker can move
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if workerPos is null
      NotPresentWorkerException - if in workerPos there isn't any worker of current Player

    • isValidMovement

      public boolean isValidMovement​(Position workerPos, Position movePos) throws java.lang.NullPointerException
      Method that check if a move from workerPos to movePos is valid
      Parameters:
      workerPos - Worker's Position before movement
      movePos - Worker's Position after movement
      Returns:
      true iff the movement is valid
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if workerPos or movePos are null

    • moveWorker

      public void moveWorker​(Position workerPos, Position movePos) throws java.lang.NullPointerException, NotPresentWorkerException, NotAdjacentMovementException
      Update model with worker's movement from workerPos to movePos.
      Parameters:
      workerPos - Worker's Position before movement. The worker must be able to move in movePos
      movePos - Worker's Position after movement. The worker must be able to move in movePos
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if workerPos or movePos are null
      NotPresentWorkerException - if in workerPos there isn't any worker of current Player
      NotAdjacentMovementException - workerPos isn't adjacent to movePos

    • hasWonWithMovement

      public boolean hasWonWithMovement()
      Check if player has won with the last movement of his worker
      Returns:
      true iff player has won with the last movement of his worker

    • canMovedWorkerBuildInAPosition

      public boolean canMovedWorkerBuildInAPosition()
      Returns:
      true iff the worker moved can build in at least one adjacent Position

    • buildPositions

      public java.util.List<Position> buildPositions() throws java.lang.NullPointerException
      Return a list which contains Position where the worker moved can build
      Returns:
      List of Position that contains Position where the moved worker can build
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException

    • isValidBuilding

      public boolean isValidBuilding​(Position buildPosition) throws java.lang.NullPointerException
      Method that check if moved worker can build in buildPosition
      Parameters:
      buildPosition - Position where Player want to build
      Returns:
      true iff the building is valid
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if workerMovedPosition or buildPosition are null

    • buildWorker

      public void buildWorker​(Position buildPosition) throws java.lang.NullPointerException, NotPresentWorkerException, NotAdjacentMovementException
      Update model with worker's building in buildPosition
      Parameters:
      buildPosition - Position where Player want to build. It must be a position where worker can build.
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if workerPos or movePos are null
      NotPresentWorkerException - if in workerPos there isn't any worker of current Player
      NotAdjacentMovementException - workerPos isn't adjacent to movePos

    • powerPositions

      public java.util.List<Position> powerPositions​(Position workerPos) throws java.lang.NullPointerException, NotPresentWorkerException
      Return a list which contains Position where the worker can use his power
      Parameters:
      workerPos - Position where is located the worker that player want to use his power
      Returns:
      List of Position that contains Position where the worker can use his power
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if workerPos is null
      NotPresentWorkerException - if in workerPos there isn't any worker of current Player

    • isValidUseOfPower

      public boolean isValidUseOfPower​(Position workerPos, Position powerPos) throws java.lang.NullPointerException
      Method that check if a use of power from worker in workerPos to powerPos is valid
      Parameters:
      workerPos - Worker's Position before power
      powerPos - Position where player want to use the power
      Returns:
      true iff the use of power is valid
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if workerPos or powerPos are null

    • usePowerWorker

      public void usePowerWorker​(Position workerPos, Position powerPos) throws java.lang.NullPointerException, NotPresentWorkerException, NotAdjacentMovementException
      Update model when a player's worker use power from workerPos to powerPos
      Parameters:
      workerPos - Worker's Position before use of power
      powerPos - Position where player want to use the power
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if workerPos or powerPos are null
      NotPresentWorkerException - if in workerPos there isn't any worker of current Player
      NotAdjacentMovementException - powerPos isn't adjacent to movePos
